name: Slash (CharlieD_Dev)
description:
Slash About

Slash was made in 3 days, for the Wowie jam 3.

Tools Used

I used my own java game engine and Boscaceoil for sounds. (Don't Have Sounds Yet Might Remove)

How To Play

Goal:

Get The Highest Final Score You Can

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Swing

General:

If you run out of health, you lose, you lose health by getting hit by orange enemies.

If you are hit by a yellow enemy, your current score is added to your final score, but you die: your combo is reset and your health is reset

Swinging:

When you swing, your trail from behind you is shot in the direction that you are moving, any enemies that are hit, die, and you get points for your current score.

Orange Enemies - 5 Points

Yellow Enemies - 25 Points

UI:

     The Top Number - Final Score

     The Bottom Number - Current Score

      Red Bar - Health
